code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var Params=createSlice({name:'Params',initialState:{value:{light:[],cost:[],format:[],Cost:[],flowers:[]}},reducers:{pushParam:function pushParam(state,_ref){var payload=_ref.payload;var name=Object.keys(payload)[0];state.value[name].push(payload[name]);},popParam:function popParam(state,_ref2){var payload=_ref2.payload;var name=Object.keys(payload)[0];state.value[name].pop(payload[name]);}}});var _Params$actions=Params.actions,pushParam=_Params$actions.pushParam,popParam=_Params$actions.popParam;export{pushParam,popParam};export default Params.reducer;
